question.en: Does it cost money to press a penny?

then.en: It costs money to press a penny.
It costs money to press a penny.
It is free to press a penny.

question.en: What coin is used for pressing?

then.de: Die Münzpresse benötigt eine 2 Cent Münze um zu Pressen.

then.ca: Esta premsa de cèntims utilitza una moneda de 2 cèntims per a premsar.
